nodes.text: Red Leader to Gold Leader: X-wing on the Horizon

Red Leader to Gold Leader: X-wing on the Horizon was an article published in LucasArts' magazine, The Adventurer 4 in Spring of 1992. It includes a brief summary of the upcoming game, Star Wars: X-Wing, which is reported to be coming in time for Christmas 1992, instead of its true release date of February 1993.
